snippet: Israeli attacks on United Nations facilities are repeating a pattern that an agency board of inquiry reported in 2009. Israel says it is addressing the issues.
abstract: More than 100 United Nations buildings have been damaged and 11 staff members killed during fighting taking place in Gaza over span of one month; incidents reflect similar violence surrounding United Nations premises and personnel in Gaza during Israeli invasion in 2009 and reveal largely unaddressed pattern of violence.
lead_paragraph: Israeli attacks on United Nations facilities are repeating a pattern that an agency board of inquiry reported in 2009. Israel says it is addressing the issues.

headline.main: Differences Between Israel and U.N. Over Gaza Episodes Go Back Years
headline.print_headline: Differences Between Israel and U.N. Over Gaza Episodes Go Back Years
